name: Steppy Dungeon
description:
Steppy Dungeon is roguelite dungeon crawler where you control the movement of both the player and the floor. Build quick though, a wall of spikes is slowly pushing you forward. 

Taking inspiration from games like Desktop Dungeons and Tetris, it's one half  dungeon crawler and one half puzzle game.  

Currently in beta. If you have any feedback or suggestions, you can comment here or twatter me on twitter.

Note: There's no sound/music at the moment. It will be added once the games a bit further along.
